categories: Category:Imperial Navy personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Noa Endac was a male Human, who served in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War.

Noa Endac was the son of a military officer and was raised on the planet Coruscant. He later joined the Imperial Navy, becoming one of the bxiest shockboxers in his class. During the Galactic Civil War, he was assigned serve aboard the Super Star Destroyer Executor as part of the ship's security force, and following the murder of Lieutenant Tanith Sorn in 3 ABY, Endac was part of a team chosen by Darth Vader to investigate the crime.
